title: Hackers Post Dozens of Malicious Copycat Repos to GitHub
summary: Hackers Post Dozens of Malicious Copycat Repos to GitHub. As package registries find better ways to combat cyberattacks, threat actors are finding other methods for spreading their malware to developers....
content: As package registries find better ways to combat cyberattacks, threat actors are finding other methods for spreading their malware to developers.
